title: Delegate Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at National Model United Nations
Interview Descriptions: They certainly have put me at ease. They asked me easy questions in order to participate at the following National Model United Nations conference in Washington (USA) as a delegate member.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this project?

title: University Recruiter Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at National Model United Nations
Interview Descriptions: In order to be selected all the interested students had to pass a written test on general culture. They also needed to be interviewed by a Professor to verify the level of English and therefore be put in two different groups for English lessons.
Interview Questions: Q: Who is the Italian Ministry of Sanitary?

title: MUN Delegate Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at National Model United Nations (Istanbul) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was just like as it's supposed to be. It was made up of 2 parts. Firstly there was a face-to-face interview with the Hiring Manager. She asked a lot of questions about my future goals and then there was a soft skills ability test.
Interview Questions: Why do you think it is necessary to be a part of MUN ?
